p: Three samples (2.8%) tested positive with DENV1-3 RPA, while none of the other arbovirus assays yielded positive results. All of the arbovirus results were confirmed by RT-PCR, with 100% concordance. The samples of the three DENV cases were additionally tested and confirmed positive by DENV NS1 antigen capture ( Table 1). The ELISA IgM test yielded negative results in all three cases (not shown). Virus isolation at 28 Â°C in C6/36 cells yielded non-obvious CPE ten days after inoculation. However, two strains were successfully isolated, and isolation was confirmed by IFA ( Figure S1). The isolates were designated Medina Gounass 1 and Medina Gounass 2, respectively.
